definition: Heping or Peace district (of many towns)/Heping district of Tianjin municipality 天津市[Tian1 jin1 shi4]/Heping district of Shenyang city 瀋陽市|沈阳市, Liaoning
to combine a powdery substance (flour, plaster etc) with water/Taiwan pr. [huo4]
to compose a poem in reply (to sb's poem) using the same rhyme sequence/to join in the singing/to chime in with others
old variant of 和[he2]/harmonious
surname He/Japanese (food, clothes etc)
old variant of 和[he2]
to mix (ingredients) together/to blend/classifier for rinses of clothes/classifier for boilings of medicinal herbs
to complete a set in mahjong or playing cards
and/together with/with/sum/union/peace/harmony/Taiwan pr. [han4] when it means "and" or "with"
surname Ping
flat/level/equal/to tie (make the same score)/to draw (score)/calm/peaceful/see also 平聲|平声[ping2 sheng1]
surname Ou
area/region/district/small/distinguish/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: To understand the effect of swage chloridizing disinfection in the hospitals of Heping District of Tianjin.
sentences.chinese: 目的了解天津市和平区医院排放污水的氯化消毒效果。

sentences.english: Heping District has longstanding advantages in the financial industry.
sentences.chinese: 和平区有着悠久的金融优势。
